meanings.definition: Trapezius: a large superficial muscle that extends longitudinally from the occipital bone to the lower thoracic vertebrae and laterally to the spine of the scapula.
meanings.sent1: The trapezii helps in moving your shoulders.
meanings.sent2: Athletes often work on strengthening their trapezii muscles.
meanings.sent3: The trapezii muscle is like a strong bridge supporting your upper body.
meanings.sent4: Her trapezii felt as solid as a pillar holding up a building.
meanings.sent5: When you stretch, you can feel the trapezii muscle at the back of your neck.
